statements: UPDATE BiometricData SET fingerprint_data='new fingerprint data' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE BiometricData SET face_data='new face data', timestamp='2022-10-15 12:34:56' WHERE user_id=2;
UPDATE BiometricData SET fingerprint_data='new_fingerprint_data', face_data='new_face_data' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE BiometricData SET face_data='updated_face_data', fingerprint_data='updated_fingerprint_data' WHERE user_id=2;
UPDATE biometric_data SET fingerprint_data = 'new fingerprint data', timestamp = NOW() WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE transaction_logs SET authorized = TRUE, amount = 100.00 WHERE transaction_id = 98765;
UPDATE biometric_data SET fingerprint_data = E'\\x0123456789ABCDEF', face_data = E'\\xABCDEF0123456789' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE transaction_logs SET amount = 1000.00, authorized = TRUE WHERE transaction_id = 123;
UPDATE biometric_data SET fingerprint_data = 'new_fingerprint_data' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE transaction_log SET amount = 100.50 WHERE transaction_id = '11111111-2222-3333-4444-555555555555';
UPDATE biometric_data SET fingerprint_data = 'new_fingerprint_data', facial_data = 'new_facial_data' WHERE user_id = 'abc123';
UPDATE authorization_log SET authorized = TRUE, timestamp = NOW() WHERE transaction_id = 'def456';
UPDATE BiometricData SET biometric_type='Fingerprint' WHERE user_id=1001;
UPDATE Users SET email='new_email@example.com', password_hash='new_password' WHERE user_id=2002;
UPDATE BiometricData SET biometric_type = 'Fingerprint', biometric_data = '02FFAE356B', timestamp = '2022-01-15 08:30:00' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE Users SET password_hash = 'hashedPassword123', email = 'example@example.com' WHERE user_id = 100
UPDATE biometric_data SET biometric_type = 'Fingerprint', timestamp = NOW() WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com', username = 'newusername' WHERE user_id = 3;
UPDATE users SET password = 'new_password', email = 'new_email@example.com', username = 'new_username' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE biometric_data SET biometric_type = 'fingerprint', biometric_data = 'new_fingerprint_data', timestamp = NOW() WHERE id = 456;
